metadata.title: USN-2360-2 -- Thunderbird vulnerabilities
metadata.description: USN-2360-1 fixed vulnerabilities in Firefox. This update provides the corresponding updates for Thunderbird.  Original advisory details:   Antoine Delignat-Lavaud and others discovered that NSS incorrectly handled  parsing ASN.1 values. An attacker could use this issue to forge RSA  certificates.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-2360-2` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  xul-ext-gdata-provider - 1:31.1.2+build1-0ubuntu0.14.04.1 thunderbird-locale-bn - 1:31.1.2+build1-0ubuntu0.14.04.1 thunderbird-locale-fr -
